SAMRAI::pdat

Face Patch Data

These classes implement a face centered patch data type. These are normally used to represent flux data between patches.
  • SAMRAI::pdat::FaceDataFactory
  • SAMRAI::pdat::FaceData
  • SAMRAI::pdat::FaceIndex
  • SAMRAI::pdat::FaceIterator
  • SAMRAI::pdat::FaceVariable
